about_the_game:
Welcome to Coconut, every two hours spin the mystical Coconut Wheel to receive a random coconut. Will you get a common coconut or will you be the lucky one to snag a super rare coconut, potentially worth a ton on the community market? The excitement of the spin will keep you coming back for more!

But that's not all - each week some coconuts will be retired and will no longer be obtainable from the wheel. This means the coconuts you collect now will become even rarer over time, increasing their value and prestige. Don't miss your chance to build the most impressive coconut collection!

Coconut is lightweight, taking up less than 0.1 GB of space on your computer, and using under 0.2% of your CPU. Plus, it can run in the background at all times, leaving your desktop free for any other activities!

This is a community game, for the community! We welcome any and all suggestions through our Discord. Join the conversation and help shape the future of Coconut. By joining our Discord, you can gain access to exclusive Discord special coconuts and potential boosts to the game in the future for those who are part of our Discord community.

Discord:


Check out our Roadmap for future developments that the community can vote on! If you find and report a bug through Discord, you could receive a free Bug Finder skin, exclusively for those who help us improve the game.

Additionally, anyone who submits a skin to be included in the game and has it accepted will receive 10% of the earnings from that coconut.

Are you ready to collect them all and spin the rarest skins? Download Coconut and start collecting limited time skins!

Welcome to Coconut, every two hours spin the mystical Coconut Wheel to receive a random coconut. Will you get a common coconut or will you be the lucky one to snag a super rare coconut, potentially worth a ton on the community market? The excitement of the spin will keep you coming back for more!

But that's not all - each week some coconuts will be retired and will no longer be obtainable from the wheel. This means the coconuts you collect now will become even rarer over time, increasing their value and prestige. Don't miss your chance to build the most impressive coconut collection!

Coconut is lightweight, taking up less than 0.1 GB of space on your computer, and using under 0.2% of your CPU. Plus, it can run in the background at all times, leaving your desktop free for any other activities!

This is a community game, for the community! We welcome any and all suggestions through our Discord. Join the conversation and help shape the future of Coconut. By joining our Discord, you can gain access to exclusive Discord special coconuts and potential boosts to the game in the future for those who are part of our Discord community.

Additionally, anyone who submits a skin to be included in the game and has it accepted will receive 10% of the earnings from that coconut.

Are you ready to collect them all and spin the rarest skins? Download Coconut and start collecting limited time skins!
name: Coconut

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Pentium III 1.0GHz
  • Memory: 1000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Integrated
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i3-10100 3.6GHz
  • Memory: 2000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060

short_description: Idle clicker with periodic free skin rolls that can be used in-game and traded.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Arabic*, Bulgarian*, Czech*, Danish*, Dutch*, Finnish*, Greek*, Hungarian*, Indonesian*, Japanese*, Korean*, Norwegian*, Polish*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Portuguese - Portugal*, Romanian*, Russian*, Simplified Chinese*, Spanish - Latin America*, Swedish*, Thai*, Traditional Chinese*, Turkish*, Ukrainian*, Vietnamese*, Afrikaans*, Albanian*, Amharic*, Armenian*, Assamese*, Azerbaijani*, Bangla*, Basque*, Belarusian*, Bosnian*, Catalan*, Cherokee*, Croatian*, Dari*, Estonian*, Filipino*, Galician*, Georgian*, Gujarati*, Hausa*, Hebrew*, Hindi*, Icelandic*, Igbo*, Irish*, K'iche'*, Kannada*, Kazakh*, Khmer*, Kinyarwanda*, Konkani*, Kyrgyz*, Latvian*, Lithuanian*, Luxembourgish*, Macedonian*, Malay*, Malayalam*, Maltese*, Maori*, Marathi*, Mongolian*, Nepali*, Odia*, Persian*, Punjabi (Gurmukhi)*, Punjabi (Shahmukhi)*, Quechua*, Scots*, Serbian*, Sindhi*, Sinhala*, Slovak*, Slovenian*, Sorani*, Sotho*, Swahili*, Tajik*, Tamil*, Tatar*, Telugu*, Tigrinya*, Tswana*, Turkmen*, Urdu*, Uyghur*, Uzbek*, Valencian*, Welsh*, Wolof*, Xhosa*, Yoruba*, Zulu*
